concept.title: Files Matching a Pattern - Pattern Constant

conbody.p: File Tail originPATTERN constant for file name patternsWhen you use the Files Matching a Pattern naming option, use the PATTERN constant as a placeholder for the file name pattern. Then you use the Pattern property to define the PATTERN constant.
